title: Social Media and UK Visa Applications
content: Ensure your profiles reflect the information provided to UK Visas and Immigration.

title: UK Student Visa: General Information
content: Cambridge and Oxford Universities require specific student visas. The required visa type depends on the course of study. Pre-arrival and orientation resources are available for international students.

citations.quote: It is important to ensure you have the correct visa which permits study in the UK. The type of visa you require depends on the type of course you are coming to study.
Information on the type of visa you require and how to apply before you arrive...
Our International Student Guide provides practical pre-arrival and orientation information to help students coming from outside the UK plan their move to Cambridge.

title: Study in the UK from Nepal
content: IDP Education assists Nepali students with UK study applications, including course/university selection and post-arrival support. The UK attracts international students due to top-ranked universities like Cambridge, Oxford, and Imperial College, cultural diversity (students from 150+ countries), and post-study work visas.

citations.quote:
Aspiring to take a big career leap? Take the perfect chance to study in the UK and turn all your dreams into reality! Top-ranked universities, lucrative career prospects, and global exposure are among the reasons why students from Nepal prefer to study in the UK...The country is home to a culturally diverse population, with students from more than 150 countries studying in the UK.
You can find some of the worldâ€™s best universities in the UK - Cambridge, Oxford, and Imperial College.
The UK government allows international students to remain and complete their course by granting them a post-study work visa.
